io.openems.edge.common.test

Class AbstractComponentTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openems.edge.common.test.AbstractComponentTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerTest

    public abstract class AbstractComponentTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a test framework for OpenEMS Components.

      • executeLogic

        protected abstract void executeLogic()
                              throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
        Executes the tested component logic. This method is executed after the inputs are applied. After finishing the expected outputs are validated.
        Throws:
        OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException - on error
